Item.method_code:
Dim myInnovator As Innovator = Me.newInnovator() Dim allClasses = Me.GetItemsByXPath("//Item[@type='TrainingClass']") Dim SqlResults, RowItem As Item
Dim sql As String Dim i As Integer = 0 For i=0 To allClasses.getItemCount()-1 sql = "SELECT count(*) FROM [TrainingClass_Contact] WHERE source_id='" & allClasses.getItemByIndex(i).getID() & "'" SqlResults = myInnovator.applySQL(sql) RowItem = SqlResults.getItemsByXPath("//row").getItemByIndex(0) allClasses.getItemByIndex(i).setProperty("students", RowItem.getProperty("column1"," ") ) Next Return Me
Item.name: TrainingClass onGet
